医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
种族和识字率影响乳腺密度临床讨论的可能性社会和人口统计资料如何影响医生与患者讨论乳腺密度的准备程度，反之亦然。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Ethnicity-and-literacy-impact-likelihood-of-clinical-discussions-on-breast-densis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Ethnicity-and-literacy-impact-likelihood-of-clinical-discussions-on-breast-densis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7949fd7b-3e47-4721-8234-32bc89311c39 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 10:34:00 -0500 Ethnicity and literacy impact likelihood of clinical discussions on breast density
德桑蒂斯和纽瑟姆互相争斗，医疗保健成为首要和中心共和党总统候选人罗恩·德桑蒂斯 (Ron DeSantis) 和民主党州长加文·纽瑟姆 (Gavin Newsom)——来自对立海岸的政治对手，也是红蓝美国的代理人——将于 11 月 30 日在佐治亚州举行首次此类辩论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Health-care-is-front-and-center-as-Desantis-and-Newsom-go-mano-a-mano.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Health-care-is-front-and-center-as-Desantis-and-Newsom-go-mano-a-mano.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67067228-0a55-4b03-a835-bbaf47162c1d Mon, 27 Nov 2023 08:50:12 -0500 Health care is front and center as Desantis and Newsom go mano a mano
Abiomed 宣布首例患者入组具有里程碑意义的 AMI 心源性休克 RECOVER IV 试验强生医疗科技旗下 Abiomed 宣布，世界上第一位患者已参加具有里程碑意义的 RECOVER IV 随机对照试验 (RCT)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Abiomed-announces-enrollment-of-first-病人-in-landmark-RECOVER-IV-trial-for-AMI-cardiogenic-shock.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Abiomed-announces-enrollment-of-first- Patient-in-landmark-RECOVER-IV-Trial-for-AMI-cardiogenic-shock.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e01a56f-f213-4611-9190-72a051c7a525 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 08:43:40 -0500 Abiomed announces enrollment of first patient in landmark RECOVER IV trial for AMI cardiogenic shock
新的人工智能算法有助于诊断疑难癌症新的人工智能算法被开发出来，以促进临床难以解释的癌性肿瘤的诊断和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-artificial-intelligence-algorithms-facilitate-diagnosis-of-difficult-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-artificial-intelligence-algorithms-facilitate-diagnosis-of-difficult-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9aa84ef7-a12b-4324-83ed-a672ed26410c Mon, 27 Nov 2023 08:36:40 -0500 New artificial intelligence algorithms facilitate diagnosis of difficult cancers
基因组haplarithmisis揭示了流产的复杂遗传景观《自然医学》发表的一项新研究报告了对 1,700 多例自发性早期流产的染色体分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Genome-haplarithmisis-sheds-light-on-complex-genic-landscape-of-miscarriages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Genome-haplarithmisis-sheds-light-on-complex-genic-landscape-of-miscarriages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15b4d641-c945-4a66-a5e0-b427cc9772e8 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 08:06:00 -0500 Genome haplarithmisis sheds light on complex genetic landscape of miscarriages
更强的股四头肌可能会降低膝关节置换风险根据今天在北美放射学会年会上发表的研究，相对于腿筋而言，股四头肌更强可能会降低全膝关节置换术的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Stronger-quadriceps-may-reduce-knee-replacement-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Stronger-quadriceps-may-reduce-knee-replacement-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc0d5866-5594-4de1-96b3-81fe0ab90735 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 07:49:34 -0500 Stronger quadriceps may reduce knee replacement risk
研究发现黑人患者认知障碍的影像获取存在差异根据本周在北美放射学会年会上公布的研究，黑人患者接受认知障碍医学影像检查的时间比白人和西班牙裔患者晚数年，而且接受 MRI 检查的频率也较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Study-finds-disparities-in-imaging-access-for-cognitive-impairment-among-Black-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Study-finds-disparities-in-imaging-access-for-cognitive-impairment-among-Black-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41135e9f-8dc9-410d-b844-0b93c9c37021 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 07:39:05 -0500 Study finds disparities in imaging access for cognitive impairment among Black patients
十分之一的处方药有行业赞助的患者支持计划大约十分之一的处方药 -；主要是品牌药和昂贵的药物以及治疗罕见疾病的药物-；有制造商赞助的患者支持计划，通常包括财务、护理和教育支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/1-in-10-prescription-drugs-has-industry-owned-病人-support-program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/1-in-10-prescription-drugs-has-industry-owned-病人-support-program.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58578925-0793-4a6b-a57f-2897e5219363 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 07:36:12 -0500 1 in 10 prescription drugs has industry-sponsored patient support program
新的机器学习模型使用心电图数据高精度预测 ICU 患者的心脏骤停来自大型回顾性队列的心电图 (ECG) 数据，用于提取各种心率变异性 (HRV) 测量值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-machine-learning-model-predicts-cardiac-arrest-in-ICU-患者-using-ECG-data-with-high-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-machine-learning-model-predicts-cardiac-arrest-in-ICU-患者-using-ECG-data-with-high-accuracy.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f1be205-f331-4cc0-94c7-74538e60b697 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 07:33:00 -0500 New machine learning model predicts cardiac arrest in ICU patients using ECG data with high accuracy
科学家发现脂肪储存的主调节基因我们都知道，考虑到影响体重的因素无数，体重增加和体重减轻并不像“卡路里摄入、卡路里消耗”那么简单。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Scientists-discover-master-regulator-gene-for-fat-storage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Scientists-discover-master-regulator-gene-for-fat-storage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a53705b-00ac-432f-b588-3c8eaf0c587e Mon, 27 Nov 2023 07:11:21 -0500 Scientists discover master regulator gene for fat storage
